00026    GroupRebridgeBase::GroupRebridgeBase(McSystem& system) : 
00027       SystemMove(system)

00036    /*
00037    * Calculate the energy change of rebridging a tetrahedron formed from
00038    * 4 atoms.
00039    *
00040    *    a - b          a   b
00041    *             ->      X
00042    *    d - c          d   c
00043    *
00044    * Erase ab & cd bonds, and add ac & bd bonds. Energy change includes the
00045    * bonding potential changes and the pairing potential changes.
00046    */
00047    void GroupRebridgeBase::
00048    tetraEnergy(Atom* aPtr, Atom* bPtr, Atom* cPtr, Atom* dPtr,
00049                int bondType, double &energy)
00050    {
00051       Vector aPos = aPtr->position();
00052       Vector bPos = bPtr->position();
00053       Vector cPos = cPtr->position();
00054       Vector dPos = dPtr->position();
00055       double lab, lcd, lac, lbd;
00056 
00057       energy = 0.0;
00058 
00059       // Calculate bond lengthSq.
00060       lab = boundary().distanceSq(aPos, bPos);
00061       lcd = boundary().distanceSq(cPos, dPos);
00062       lac = boundary().distanceSq(aPos, cPos);
00063       lbd = boundary().distanceSq(bPos, dPos);
00064 
00065       // Subtract old bonding energies.
00066       energy -= system().bondPotential().energy(lab, bondType);
00067       energy -= system().bondPotential().energy(lcd, bondType);
00068 
00069       // Add new bonding energies.
00070       energy += system().bondPotential().energy(lac, bondType);
00071       energy += system().bondPotential().energy(lbd, bondType);
00072    
00073       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00074       int    aId = aPtr->typeId();
00075       int    bId = bPtr->typeId();
00076       int    cId = cPtr->typeId();
00077       int    dId = dPtr->typeId();
00078 
00079       // Subtract old pairing potentials.
00080       energy -= system().pairPotential().energy(lac, aId, cId);
00081       energy -= system().pairPotential().energy(lbd, bId, dId);
00082 
00083       // Add new pairing potentials.
00084       energy += system().pairPotential().energy(lab, aId, bId);
00085       energy += system().pairPotential().energy(lcd, cId, dId);
00086       #endif
00087 
00088       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00089       if (system().hasAnglePotential()) {
00090 
00091          // Implementation assumed linear or ring molecular topology
00092          const Atom *amPtr(NULL), *bpPtr(NULL), *cmPtr(NULL), *dpPtr(NULL);
00093          Species *species;
00094          Species::AtomBondArray bonds;
00095          Species::AtomAngleArray angles;
00096          const Bond *bondPtr;
00097          int   iBond, angleType;
00098    
00099          // find the neighboring atom pointers and angle type
00100          species = &aPtr->molecule().species();
00101    
00102          // angle type
00103          species->getAtomAngles(*aPtr, angles); 
00104          angleType = angles[0]->typeId();
00105    
00106          // amPtr
00107          species->getAtomBonds(*aPtr, bonds);
00108          for (iBond = 0; iBond < bonds.size(); ++iBond) {
00109             bondPtr = bonds[iBond];
00110             if (&bondPtr->atom(0) != aPtr && &bondPtr->atom(0) != bPtr) {
00111                amPtr = &bondPtr->atom(0);
00112             } else if (&bondPtr->atom(1) != aPtr && &bondPtr->atom(1) != bPtr){
00113                amPtr = &bondPtr->atom(1);
00114             }
00115          }
00116    
00117          // bpPtr
00118          species->getAtomBonds(*bPtr, bonds);
00119          for (iBond = 0; iBond < bonds.size(); ++iBond) {
00120             bondPtr = bonds[iBond];
00121             if (&bondPtr->atom(0) != bPtr && &bondPtr->atom(0) != aPtr) {
00122                bpPtr = &bondPtr->atom(0);
00123             } else if (&bondPtr->atom(1) != bPtr && &bondPtr->atom(1) != aPtr){
00124                bpPtr = &bondPtr->atom(1);
00125             }
00126          }
00127    
00128          // cmPtr
00129          species->getAtomBonds(*cPtr, bonds);
00130          for (iBond = 0; iBond < bonds.size(); ++iBond) {
00131             bondPtr = bonds[iBond];
00132             if (&bondPtr->atom(0) != cPtr && &bondPtr->atom(0) != dPtr) {
00133                cmPtr = &bondPtr->atom(0);
00134             } else if (&bondPtr->atom(1) != cPtr && &bondPtr->atom(1) != dPtr){
00135                cmPtr = &bondPtr->atom(1);
00136             }
00137          }
00138    
00139          // dpPtr
00140          species->getAtomBonds(*dPtr, bonds);
00141          for (iBond = 0; iBond < bonds.size(); ++iBond) {
00142             bondPtr = bonds[iBond];
00143             if (&bondPtr->atom(0) != dPtr && &bondPtr->atom(0) != cPtr) {
00144                dpPtr = &bondPtr->atom(0);
00145             } else if (&bondPtr->atom(1) != cPtr && &bondPtr->atom(1) != dPtr){
00146                dpPtr = &bondPtr->atom(1);
00147             }
00148          }
00149    
00150          // subtract energies of angles involving bond a-b
00151          energy -= angleEnergy(*amPtr, *aPtr, *bPtr, angleType);
00152          energy -= angleEnergy(*aPtr, *bPtr, *bpPtr, angleType);
00153    
00154          // subtract energies of angles involving bond c-d
00155          energy -= angleEnergy(*cmPtr, *cPtr, *dPtr, angleType);
00156          energy -= angleEnergy(*cPtr, *dPtr, *dpPtr, angleType);
00157    
00158          // add energies of angles involving bond a-c
00159          energy += angleEnergy(*amPtr, *aPtr, *cPtr, angleType);
00160          energy += angleEnergy(*aPtr, *cPtr, *cmPtr, angleType);
00161    
00162          // add energies of angles involving bond b-d
00163          energy += angleEnergy(*bpPtr, *bPtr, *dPtr, angleType);
00164          energy += angleEnergy(*bPtr, *dPtr, *dpPtr, angleType);
00165    
00166       }
00167       #endif
00168    }
00169 
00170    /*
00171    * Calculate the energy change of rebridging an octahedron formed
00172    * from 6 atoms.
00173    *
00174    *    a - m - b          a   m   b
00175    *                 ->      X   X
00176    *    c - n - d          c   n   d
00177    *
00178    * Erase 4 bonds: am, mb, cn, nd
00179    * Add   4 bonds: an, nb, cm, md
00180    * The erased bonds contribute to the pairing interactions, but
00181    * the pair of atoms involved in the newly added bonds lost their pairing
00182    * interaction.
00183    */
00184    void GroupRebridgeBase::
00185    octaEnergy(Atom* aPtr, Atom* bPtr, Atom* cPtr, Atom* dPtr,
00186               Atom* mPtr, Atom* nPtr, int bondType, double &energy)
00187    {
00188       Vector aPos = aPtr->position();
00189       Vector bPos = bPtr->position();
00190       Vector cPos = cPtr->position();
00191       Vector dPos = dPtr->position();
00192       Vector mPos = mPtr->position();
00193       Vector nPos = nPtr->position();
00194       double lam, lmb, lcn, lnd;
00195       double lan, lnb, lcm, lmd;
00196 
00197       energy = 0.0;
00198 
00199       // Calculate atom pair distances squared.
00200       lam = boundary().distanceSq(aPos, mPos);
00201       lmb = boundary().distanceSq(mPos, bPos);
00202       lcn = boundary().distanceSq(cPos, nPos);
00203       lnd = boundary().distanceSq(nPos, dPos);
00204 
00205       lan = boundary().distanceSq(aPos, nPos);
00206       lnb = boundary().distanceSq(nPos, bPos);
00207       lcm = boundary().distanceSq(cPos, mPos);
00208       lmd = boundary().distanceSq(mPos, dPos);
00209 
00210       // Subtract old bonding energies.
00211       energy -= system().bondPotential().energy(lam, bondType);
00212       energy -= system().bondPotential().energy(lmb, bondType);
00213       energy -= system().bondPotential().energy(lcn, bondType);
00214       energy -= system().bondPotential().energy(lnd, bondType);
00215 
00216       // Add new bonding energies.
00217       energy += system().bondPotential().energy(lan, bondType);
00218       energy += system().bondPotential().energy(lnb, bondType);
00219       energy += system().bondPotential().energy(lcm, bondType);
00220       energy += system().bondPotential().energy(lmd, bondType);
00221   
00222       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00223       int    aId = aPtr->typeId();
00224       int    bId = bPtr->typeId();
00225       int    cId = cPtr->typeId();
00226       int    dId = dPtr->typeId();
00227       int    mId = mPtr->typeId();
00228       int    nId = nPtr->typeId();
00229 
00230       // Subtract old pairing potentials.
00231       energy -= system().pairPotential().energy(lan, aId, nId);
00232       energy -= system().pairPotential().energy(lnb, nId, bId);
00233       energy -= system().pairPotential().energy(lcm, cId, mId);
00234       energy -= system().pairPotential().energy(lmd, mId, dId);
00235 
00236       // Add new pairing potentials.
00237       energy += system().pairPotential().energy(lam, aId, mId);
00238       energy += system().pairPotential().energy(lmb, mId, bId);
00239       energy += system().pairPotential().energy(lcn, cId, nId);
00240       energy += system().pairPotential().energy(lnd, nId, dId);
00241       #endif
00242    }
00243 }
00244 #endif
